meagre.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a meagre amount of food, money etc is too small and is much less than you need
meagre.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a meagre diet of bread and beans
He supplements his meager income by working on Saturdays.
meagre.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Sales rose a meager 2.5% in January.
The chairman predicts very meagre growth this year.
